entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,699Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 50

Summary: After Tobias Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stilinski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles. Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!

entry.title: Dirty Little Secret
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,171Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Derek Hale seems to have it all: popularity, talent, a perfect family… and a secret he can’t control. Stiles Stilinski hides from the world, carrying loss, absence, and a body that never feels enough. One night, lost in his own frustration, Derek stumbles across Stiles’ anonymous Tumblr blog. Something about the words he reads draws him in, and an unexpected connection sparks. Late-night messages spill fears, frustrations, and desires neither of them would dare share in person. They don’t know they walk the same school halls, yet slowly, they begin to unravel each other’s carefully guarded walls, piece by piece. As messages turn into confessions and silences grow heavier with unspoken truths, the line between curiosity, longing, and something more dangerous starts to blur. Two lives that seem entirely opposite begin to collide, and the safe, controlled worlds they built for themselves threaten to slip away — leaving only questions, tension, and the possibility of something neither of them expected.

entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,580Chapters: 7/16Kudos: 87

Summary: It’s the end of the war and to Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski, it feels as if everyone is celebrating except for him. Perhaps it is the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time and musket balls. Or perhaps it is the doubt he harbours in his heart that he can truly be good at anything but soldiering.Regardless, he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worthy of the name and listening while the locals sing their songs and toast to fallen soldiers. He doesn't think about the men lost from his own rifle regiment, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale of Triskele, last seen leaping into battle with typical reckless heroism. Because even if he had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. They were from two different worlds.
